title: Did Donald Trump Predict the ‘Pizzagate’ Conspiracy Theory in a 2011 Interview?
subtitle: Although Trump did mention the word "Pizzagate", he was referring to a non-controversy over a lunch meeting with Sarah Palin, not the pedophile ring conspiracy theory.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Donald Trump referred to the pedophilia conspiracy theory that has come to be known as "Pizzagate" during a 2011 interview.
